info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Union County through 430 PM EDT... At 359 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 18 miles southwest of Albemarle to 12 miles southeast of Monroe. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wingate, Marshville, Sturdivants and New Salem. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
